LanguageData.Filth_USInsectKillFoam.label: Insect Killer Foam
LanguageData.USInsectKillLiquid.label: Insect Killer Liquid
LanguageData.USInsectKillLiquid.description: A powerfull caustic neurotoxin applied as a foam. This particular liquid is particulatly caustic to insect flesh and fluids which it will also combust with.
LanguageData.Gun_USSprayer_InsectKill.label: Insect Killer Sprayer
LanguageData.Gun_USSprayer_InsectKill.description: Sprayer that applies a caustic neurotoxin as a foam. The chemicals associated with this sprayer will break down and combust with exposed insectoid flesh and fluids.
LanguageData.Gun_USSprayer_InsectKill.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_USSprayer_InsectKill.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_USInsectKill_Foam.label: Insect Killer Foam
